as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

invert.description: A boolean to invert the stepper item.
invert.description_zh: 一个布尔值,用于反转步进器项目.

step.description: A unique value that associates the stepper item with an index.
step.description_zh: 一个唯一的值,将步进器项目与索引关联.

disabled.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the step.
disabled.description_zh: 当为 `true` 时,防止用户与步骤交互.

completed.description: Shows whether the step is completed.
